headline: Kimberly-Clark to Announce Second Quarter 2025 Results on August 1, 2025
summary: Kimberly-Clark (NASDAQ: KMB) will issue its second quarter 2025 results on Friday, August 1. A press release and supplemental materials will be issued at approximately 6:30 a.m. EDT.

headline: Professional Hygiene Market Insights Report 2025-2030 | Growing Attention Towards Green Solutions, Shift Towards Advanced Solutions, Concerns About Hygiene and Sanitation
summary: The global Professional Hygiene Market, valued at USD 17.80 billion in 2024, is projected to grow at a 5.84% CAGR, reaching USD 25.02 billion by 2030, driven by increased hygiene awareness and government support. Tissue & napkins dominate the product segment with an 80% share, while hospitality is the top application sector. The online distribution channel is set for a 7% growth rate, and North America leads the market share with notable growth in APAC. Trends include green hygiene solutions and

headline: Kimberly-Clark Sells Majority Stake in Global Tissue Biz to Suzano in $1.7B Streamlining Play
summary: Kimberly-Clark Corporation (NASDAQ:KMB) is one of the Best Stagflation Stocks to Buy Now. In June 2025, Kimberly-Clark announced a sweeping joint venture with Brazilian pulp giant Suzano, marking one of the company’s boldest strategic pivots in years. Under the deal, Suzano will acquire a 51% stake in Kimberly-Clark’s international tissue business for $1.73 billion in […]
